Uses of Class
com.janeirodigital.sai.authentication.SolidOidcSession.Builder

    • Uses of SolidOidcSession.Builder in com.janeirodigital.sai.authentication

      Methods in com.janeirodigital.sai.authentication that return SolidOidcSession.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.addRedirect​(URL redirect)
      Adds a redirect URI to use in the authorization request
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.prepareCodeRequest()
      Prepares an Authorization Code Request which should be provided to the Social Agent for review in-browser
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.processCodeResponse​(URL redirectResponse)
      Process the response to the authorization code request.
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.requestTokens()
      Request tokens from the token endpoint of the openid connect provider
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setApplication​(URL applicationId)
      Sets the client Application that will use the Solid-OIDC session.
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setApplication​(URL applicationId, boolean manual)
      Sets the client application identifier for the Solid-OIDC session, with the ability to lookup the client document and extract additional criteria (redirect uris and scope) for the session automatically (which can be disabled by setting manual to false).
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setHttpClient​(okhttp3.OkHttpClient httpClient)
      Sets an http client that can be used for various operations when building a Solid OIDC session
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setPrompt​(com.nimbusds.openid.connect.sdk.Prompt prompt)
      Sets the prompt to use in the authorization request
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setRedirects​(List<URL> redirects)
      Sets the list of redirect URIs to use in the authorization request
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setScope​(List<String> scopes)
      Sets the authorization scopes to use in the authorization request
      SolidOidcSession.Builder SolidOidcSession.Builder.setSocialAgent​(URL socialAgentId)
      Sets the Social Agent that the Solid-OIDC session will be established on behalf of.
